漰字的基本解释

漰
bēn
古通“奔”：“颓波漰注，冲击横山。”

漰
pēng
象声词，波涛相互冲击发出的声音。

漰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pēng］
［《廣韻》普朋切，平登，滂。］
(1)水激声。参见“漰湱”。
(2)山涧之水。
(3)用同“噴”。喷溅。
(4)堰坝。

漰字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　漰； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页647第06
【廣韻】普朋切【集韻】披朋切，?音堋。漰渤，水擊聲。【郭璞·江賦】鼓㕉窟以漰渤。　又漰口，地名，在彭川。【杜甫詩】漰口江如練。　又與堋同。【寰宇記】漰作堋。蜀人謂堰爲堋。　又【集韻】披耕切，音怦。義同。

漰字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
漰字的起名意思

暂无。

noise of dashing waves
Basic explanation of words
noise of dashing waves
bēn
Gu Tong "Ben": "The droopy wave slams into Hengshan."
noise of dashing waves
pēng
Onomatopoeia, the sound of waves colliding with each other.
noise of dashing waves
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [pēng]
["Guangyun" Pu Pengqie, Ping Deng, Pang. ]
(1) Water-induced sound. See "漰湱".
(2) Mountain stream water.
(3) Use the same as "spray". splash.
(4) Barrage.
noise of dashing waves
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Siji 1】【Water Word Department】　漰; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 647 06
[Guang Yun] Pu Peng Che [Ji Yun] Phi Peng Che,? Yin Xun. Suibo, the sound of water hammering. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] Drum 㕉 Caves are named after Bo Bo.　Yuankou, place name, in Pengchuan. [Poems of Du Fu] The river in the mouth is like practice.　Same as Hori again. 【Wanyu Ji】漰作堋. The people of Shu called the weir as 堋.　[Jiyun] Phi Gengqie, sound thumping. The same meaning.
noise of dashing waves
